title: 2006 Load Trailer 16' Carrier Trailer
item_description:
2006 Load Trailer 16' Carrier Trailer

Trailer Details

  • Year: 2006
  • Make: Load Trail
  • Model: Carrier
  • VIN: 4ZESH162X61015054
  • License: 4JC2947
    • Expiration Date: 3/31/2027
  • Trailer Type: Flatbed

Dimensions

  • Overall Length: 234”
  • Overall Width: 101”
  • Overall Height: 36”
  • Deck Length: 190”
  • Deck Width: 80”
  • Side Height: 10”
  • Width Between Fenders: 82”

Axles, Brakes, and Tires

  • Suspension: Leaf Spring
  • Number of Axles: 2
  • Brake Type: Electric
  • Number of Wheels: 4
  • Tire Size: St205/75r15
  • Electric Plug Type: 7-Way Round
  • Hitch: 2" Ball

Features

  • Features: Ramps

Note: Certificate of Title, and Transfer Form will be mailed 1 week following the last day of removal. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of the inspections, transfer, registration, sales tax, and fees due to DMV.
